etymology.description: semantic 宀 (roof) + phonetic 子 (OC *ʔslɯʔ, child).
etymology.interpretation: A child under a roof evokes a domestic or scholastic setting, hinting at learning and writing, while 子 contributes the sound. Together it signals the idea of written symbols learned indoors, leading to the meaning “character.”

examples.chinese: 这个字很难写(這個字很難寫)。
examples.english: This character is hard to write.

examples.chinese: 我不认识这个字(我不認識這個字)。
请把每个字写清楚(請把每個字寫清楚)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ měi gè zì xiě qīngchu.
